Package io.github.amanshuraikwar.cryptonyte.ui.list

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SimpleListItemOnClickListener
    Simple list item on click listener.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ListItem<OnClickListener>
    List item used throughout the app representing a list item of a RecyclerView.
    ListItemTypeFactory
    List item type factory responsible for getting layout id and ViewHolder instance.
    RecyclerViewAdapter
    RecyclerView adapter which supports different type of ViewHolders efficiently.
    ViewHolder<Item extends ListItem>
    Base ViewHolder used throughout the app.
